name: Bahia - Gold Maduro - Robusto
additionalNotes: Bahia Gold Maduro embraces the expectations, to deliver a highly worthy follow-up to the esteemed Bahia Gold. Bringing big-league flavors and complexity to the plate, the Bahia Gold Maduro is another home-run. Utilizing the original recipe crafted by Don Douglas in the 1980's Costa Rican factory, Bahia Gold Maduro is a treat for the senses. Up front, spicy-sweet notes coat the palate, as layers of cedar, coffee, tobacco, and a toasty finish soon follow suit.
